of_unramified_and_smooth:
theorem formally_etale.of_unramified_and_smooth [h₁ : formally_unramified R A] [h₂ : formally_smooth R A] :
    formally_etale R A :=
  formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth.mpr ⟨h₁, h₂⟩
#align formally_etale.of_unramified_and_smooth formally_etale.of_unramified_and_smooth
of_split:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
theorem formally_smooth.of_split [formally_smooth R P] (g : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R («expr ⧸ » P (f.to_ring_hom.ker ^ 2)))
    (hg : f.ker_square_lift.comp g = AlgHom.id R A) : formally_smooth R A :=
  by
  constructor
  intro C _ _ I hI i
  let l : «expr →ₐ[ ] » («expr ⧸ » P (f.to_ring_hom.ker ^ 2)) R C :=
    by
    refine' Ideal.Quotient.liftₐ _ (formally_smooth.lift I ⟨2, hI⟩ (i.comp f)) _
    have : RingHom.ker f ≤ I.comap (formally_smooth.lift I ⟨2, hI⟩ (i.comp f)) :=
      by
      rintro x (hx : f x = 0)
      have : _ = i (f x) := (formally_smooth.mk_lift I ⟨2, hI⟩ (i.comp f) x : _)
      rwa [hx, map_zero, ← Ideal.Quotient.mk_eq_mk, Submodule.Quotient.mk_eq_zero] at this
    intro x hx
    have := (Ideal.pow_mono this 2).trans (Ideal.le_comap_pow _ 2) hx
    rwa [hI] at this
  have : i.comp f.ker_square_lift = (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R _).comp l :=
    by
    apply AlgHom.coe_ringHom_injective
    apply Ideal.Quotient.ringHom_ext
    ext x
    exact (formally_smooth.mk_lift I ⟨2, hI⟩ (i.comp f) x).symm
  exact ⟨l.comp g, by rw [← AlgHom.comp_assoc, ← this, AlgHom.comp_assoc, hg, AlgHom.comp_id]⟩
#align formally_smooth.of_split formally_smooth.of_split
of_is_localization:
theorem formally_etale.of_is_localization : formally_etale R Rₘ :=
  formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth.mpr
    ⟨formally_unramified.of_is_localization M, formally_smooth.of_is_localization M⟩
#align formally_etale.of_is_localization formally_etale.of_is_localization
of_equiv:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ₐ[ ] » -/
theorem formally_etale.of_equiv [formally_etale R A] (e : «expr ≃ₐ[ ] » A R B) : formally_etale R B :=
  formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth.mpr ⟨formally_unramified.of_equiv e, formally_smooth.of_equiv e⟩
#align formally_etale.of_equiv formally_etale.of_equiv
of_comp:
theorem formally_unramified.of_comp [formally_unramified R B] : formally_unramified A B :=
  by
  constructor
  intro Q _ _ I e f₁ f₂ e'
  letI := ((algebraMap A Q).comp (algebraMap R A)).to_algebra
  letI : IsScalarTower R A Q := IsScalarTower.of_algebraMap_eq' rfl
  refine' AlgHom.restrictScalars_injective R _
  refine' formally_unramified.ext I ⟨2, e⟩ _
  intro x
  exact AlgHom.congr_fun e' x
#align formally_unramified.of_comp formally_unramified.of_comp
mk_lift:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
@[simp]
theorem formally_smooth.mk_lift [formally_smooth R A] (I : Ideal B) (hI : IsNilpotent I)
    (g : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R («expr ⧸ » B I)) (x : A) : Ideal.Quotient.mk I (formally_smooth.lift I hI g x) = g x :=
  AlgHom.congr_fun (formally_smooth.comp_lift I hI g : _) x
#align formally_smooth.mk_lift formally_smooth.mk_lift
localization_map:
theorem formally_etale.localization_map [formally_etale R S] : formally_etale Rₘ Sₘ :=
  by
  haveI : formally_etale S Sₘ := formally_etale.of_is_localization (M.map (algebraMap R S))
  haveI : formally_etale R Sₘ := formally_etale.comp R S Sₘ
  exact formally_etale.localization_base M
#align formally_etale.localization_map formally_etale.localization_map
localization_base:
theorem formally_etale.localization_base [formally_etale R Sₘ] : formally_etale Rₘ Sₘ :=
  formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth.mpr
    ⟨formally_unramified.localization_base M, formally_smooth.localization_base M⟩
#align formally_etale.localization_base formally_etale.localization_base
lift_unique_of_ring_hom:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
theorem formally_unramified.lift_unique_of_ring_hom [formally_unramified R A] {C : Type u} [CommRing C]
    (f : «expr →+* » B C) (hf : IsNilpotent f.ker) (g₁ g₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R B)
    (h : f.comp ↑g₁ = f.comp (g₂ : «expr →+* » A B)) : g₁ = g₂ :=
  formally_unramified.lift_unique _ hf _ _
    (by
      ext x
      have := RingHom.congr_fun h x
      simpa only [Ideal.Quotient.eq, Function.comp_apply, AlgHom.coe_comp, Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ_eq_mk, RingHom.mem_ker,
        map_sub, sub_eq_zero] )
#align formally_unramified.lift_unique_of_ring_hom formally_unramified.lift_unique_of_ring_hom
lift_unique':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
theorem formally_unramified.lift_unique' [formally_unramified R A] {C : Type u} [CommRing C] [Algebra R C]
    (f : «expr →ₐ[ ] » B R C) (hf : IsNilpotent (f : «expr →+* » B C).ker) (g₁ g₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R B)
    (h : f.comp g₁ = f.comp g₂) : g₁ = g₂ :=
  formally_unramified.ext' _ hf g₁ g₂ (AlgHom.congr_fun h)
#align formally_unramified.lift_unique' formally_unramified.lift_unique'
lift_unique:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
theorem formally_unramified.lift_unique {B : Type u} [CommRing B] [_RB : Algebra R B] [formally_unramified R A]
    (I : Ideal B) (hI : IsNilpotent I) (g₁ g₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R B)
    (h : (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R I).comp g₁ = (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R I).comp g₂) : g₁ = g₂ :=
  by
  revert g₁ g₂
  change function.injective (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R I).comp
  revert _RB
  apply Ideal.IsNilpotent.induction_on I hI
  · intro B _ I hI _
    exact formally_unramified.comp_injective I hI
  · intro B _ I J hIJ h₁ h₂ _ g₁ g₂ e
    apply h₁
    apply h₂
    ext x
    replace e := AlgHom.congr_fun e x
    dsimp only [AlgHom.comp_apply, Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ_eq_mk] at e⊢
    rwa [Ideal.Quotient.eq, ← map_sub, Ideal.mem_quotient_iff_mem hIJ, ← Ideal.Quotient.eq]
#align formally_unramified.lift_unique formally_unramified.lift_unique
lift_of_surjective_apply:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
@[simp]
theorem formally_smooth.lift_of_surjective_apply [formally_smooth R A] (f : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R C)
    (g : «expr →ₐ[ ] » B R C) (hg : function.surjective g) (hg' : IsNilpotent (g : «expr →+* » B C).ker) (x : A) :
    g (formally_smooth.lift_of_surjective f g hg hg' x) = f x :=
  by
  apply (Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective hg).symm.injective
  change _ = ((Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective hg).symm.to_alg_hom.comp f) x
  rw [← formally_smooth.mk_lift _ hg' ((Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective hg).symm.to_alg_hom.comp f)]
  apply (Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective hg).injective
  rw [AlgEquiv.apply_symm_apply, Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective, Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfRightInverse.apply]
  exact (Ideal.kerLiftAlg_mk _ _).symm
#align formally_smooth.lift_of_surjective_apply formally_smooth.lift_of_surjective_apply
iff_unramified_and_smooth:
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Andrew Yang. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Andrew Yang
-/
theorem formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth : formally_etale R A ↔ formally_unramified R A ∧ formally_smooth R A :=
  by
  rw [formally_unramified_iff, formally_smooth_iff, formally_etale_iff]
  simp_rw [← forall_and]
  rfl
#align formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth
iff_subsingleton_kaehler_differential:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«exprΩ[ ⁄ ]» -/
theorem formally_unramified.iff_subsingleton_kaehler_differential :
    formally_unramified R S ↔ subsingleton («exprΩ[ ⁄ ]» S R) :=
  by
  constructor
  · intros
    infer_instance
  · intro H
    constructor
    intro B _ _ I hI f₁ f₂ e
    letI := f₁.to_ring_hom.to_algebra
    haveI := IsScalarTower.of_algebraMap_eq' f₁.comp_algebra_map.symm
    have :=
      ((kaehler_differential.linear_map_equiv_derivation R S).to_equiv.trans
            (derivation_to_square_zero_equiv_lift I hI)).surjective.subsingleton
    exact subtype.ext_iff.mp (@subsingleton.elim this ⟨f₁, rfl⟩ ⟨f₂, e.symm⟩)
#align formally_unramified.iff_subsingleton_kaehler_differential formally_unramified.iff_subsingleton_kaehler_differential
iff_split_surjection:
/-- Let `P →ₐ[R] A` be a surjection with kernel `J`, and `P` a formally smooth `R`-algebra,
then `A` is formally smooth over `R` iff the surjection `P ⧸ J ^ 2 →ₐ[R] A` has a section.

Geometric intuition: we require that a first-order thickening of `Spec A` inside `Spec P` admits
a retraction. -/
theorem formally_smooth.iff_split_surjection [formally_smooth R P] :
    formally_smooth R A ↔ ∃ g, f.ker_square_lift.comp g = AlgHom.id R A :=
  by
  constructor
  · intro
    have surj : function.surjective f.ker_square_lift := fun x => ⟨Submodule.Quotient.mk (hf x).some, (hf x).some_spec⟩
    have sqz : RingHom.ker f.ker_square_lift.to_ring_hom ^ 2 = 0 := by
      rw [alg_hom.ker_ker_sqare_lift, ideal.cotangent_ideal_square, Ideal.zero_eq_bot]
    refine' ⟨formally_smooth.lift _ ⟨2, sqz⟩ (Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective surj).symm.to_alg_hom, _⟩
    ext x
    have :=
      (Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective surj).to_alg_hom.congr_arg
        (formally_smooth.mk_lift _ ⟨2, sqz⟩ (Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective surj).symm.to_alg_hom x)
    dsimp at this
    rw [AlgEquiv.apply_symm_apply] at this
    conv_rhs => rw [← this, AlgHom.id_apply]
    obtain ⟨y, e⟩ :=
      Ideal.Quotient.mk_surjective
        (formally_smooth.lift _ ⟨2, sqz⟩ (Ideal.quotientKerAlgEquivOfSurjective surj).symm.to_alg_hom x)
    dsimp at e⊢
    rw [← e]
    rfl
  · rintro ⟨g, hg⟩
    exact formally_smooth.of_split f g hg
#align formally_smooth.iff_split_surjection formally_smooth.iff_split_surjection
ext':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
theorem formally_unramified.ext' [formally_unramified R A] {C : Type u} [CommRing C] (f : «expr →+* » B C)
    (hf : IsNilpotent f.ker) (g₁ g₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R B) (h : ∀ x, f (g₁ x) = f (g₂ x)) : g₁ = g₂ :=
  formally_unramified.lift_unique_of_ring_hom f hf g₁ g₂ (RingHom.ext h)
#align formally_unramified.ext' formally_unramified.ext'
ext:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
theorem formally_unramified.ext [formally_unramified R A] (hI : IsNilpotent I) {g₁ g₂ : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R B}
    (H : ∀ x, Ideal.Quotient.mk I (g₁ x) = Ideal.Quotient.mk I (g₂ x)) : g₁ = g₂ :=
  formally_unramified.lift_unique I hI g₁ g₂ (AlgHom.ext H)
#align formally_unramified.ext formally_unramified.ext
exists_lift:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ≃ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
theorem formally_smooth.exists_lift {B : Type u} [CommRing B] [_RB : Algebra R B] [formally_smooth R A] (I : Ideal B)
    (hI : IsNilpotent I) (g : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R («expr ⧸ » B I)) :
    ∃ f : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R B, (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R I).comp f = g :=
  by
  revert g
  change function.surjective (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R I).comp
  revert _RB
  apply Ideal.IsNilpotent.induction_on I hI
  · intro B _ I hI _
    exact formally_smooth.comp_surjective I hI
  · intro B _ I J hIJ h₁ h₂ _ g
    let this : «expr ≃ₐ[ ] » («expr ⧸ » («expr ⧸ » B I) (J.map (Ideal.Quotient.mk I))) R («expr ⧸ » B J) :=
      { (DoubleQuot.quotQuotEquivQuotSup I J).trans (Ideal.quotEquivOfEq (sup_eq_right.mpr hIJ)) with
        commutes' := fun x => rfl }
    obtain ⟨g', e⟩ := h₂ (this.symm.to_alg_hom.comp g)
    obtain ⟨g', rfl⟩ := h₁ g'
    replace e := congr_arg this.to_alg_hom.comp e
    conv_rhs at e =>
      rw [← AlgHom.comp_assoc, AlgEquiv.toAlgHom_eq_coe, AlgEquiv.toAlgHom_eq_coe, AlgEquiv.comp_symm, AlgHom.id_comp]
    exact ⟨g', e⟩
#align formally_smooth.exists_lift formally_smooth.exists_lift
comp_lift_of_surjective:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →+* » -/
@[simp]
theorem formally_smooth.comp_lift_of_surjective [formally_smooth R A] (f : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R C)
    (g : «expr →ₐ[ ] » B R C) (hg : function.surjective g) (hg' : IsNilpotent (g : «expr →+* » B C).ker) :
    g.comp (formally_smooth.lift_of_surjective f g hg hg') = f :=
  AlgHom.ext (formally_smooth.lift_of_surjective_apply f g hg hg')
#align formally_smooth.comp_lift_of_surjective formally_smooth.comp_lift_of_surjective
comp_lift:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₐ[ ] » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
@[simp]
theorem formally_smooth.comp_lift [formally_smooth R A] (I : Ideal B) (hI : IsNilpotent I)
    (g : «expr →ₐ[ ] » A R («expr ⧸ » B I)) : (Ideal.Quotient.mkₐ R I).comp (formally_smooth.lift I hI g) = g :=
  (formally_smooth.exists_lift I hI g).some_spec
#align formally_smooth.comp_lift formally_smooth.comp_lift
comp:
theorem formally_etale.comp [formally_etale R A] [formally_etale A B] : formally_etale R B :=
  formally_etale.iff_unramified_and_smooth.mpr ⟨formally_unramified.comp R A B, formally_smooth.comp R A B⟩
#align formally_etale.comp formally_etale.comp
